name: Create product sheets from a Google Docs template for all Shopify items
description: Let Make create automatically a Product Sheet for every item in your Shopify store. This template requires to make a copy of this [example document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TmivpEziHJ4HZ-EDsGS4iModiaLDpOts7l7n4JfltS4/edit?usp=sharing).
